attributes.comment:
I oppose the increase of any fees relating to the adoption of children- notably the I-
171 H/I-600 , fingerprint and the COC fees. Adoption timelines are taking longer
and the time validity of adoption paperwork has decreased. This means that many
families have to resubmitt their paperwork before the adoption is completed.To pay
additonal fees for resubmitting paperwork is an unfair burden on families that are
already paying huge amounts of money in this process.Adding additonal costs on
to this is not right.
Additonally, the USCIS timeline for processing this paperwork continue to
increase adding additional anxiety and stress on the families(mine included).
Please hold the fees related to adoption since at best case they are excessive
anyway.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Melissa McMoil
